metadata.Title: CVE-2018-16429 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
GNOME GLib 2.56.1 has an out-of-bounds read vulnerability in g_markup_parse_context_parse() in gmarkup.c, related to utf8_str().

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-16429` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libglib2.0-0 - 2.56.2-0ubuntu0.18.04.2
libglib2.0-bin - 2.56.2-0ubuntu0.18.04.2
libglib2.0-data - 2.56.2-0ubuntu0.18.04.2
libglib2.0-tests - 2.56.2-0ubuntu0.18.04.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: glib2.0 package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.56.2-0ubuntu0.18.04.2').
